references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: Nerf is a seminal paper that introduced the use of neural radiance fields for novel view synthesis, which is a core concept in the TrajectoryCrafter paper.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which are at the heart of the generative aspect of TrajectoryCrafter.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper provides the foundation for the diffusion models used to generate the high-resolution novel views within TrajectoryCrafter.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: 3D gaussian splatting is a vital algorithm used to represent and render 3D scenes in real-time, enabling fast training and high-quality rendering within TrajectoryCrafter.
This paper presents a Scalable Diffusion model with Transformers which enhances and scales the diffusion model architecture used by TrajectoryCrafter.
